title: Cohort schema
$comment: The schema can be indirectly applied to both CouchDB document and Cohort API response data, assuming that:  'uuid' property replaced '_id' and 'rev' property is removed.

type.description: Type of medium to be used to display image.
type.$comment: So far only one option is available: 'url', since this can be used both for links and serialized image data. In future other forms of embedding external graphics can be useful

value.description: The link to logo or encoded with base64 serialized version of cohort
value.$comment: The value can be an absolute link eg.https://www.miccai2021.org/files/images/layout/en/miccai2021-logo.png or encoded string with binaries, i.e.  data:image/png;base64,...

url.description: Link to the external Cohort home page

pi.description: Identifier of Principal Investigator of cohort

creationDate.description: Date of creation of the cohort.

relativePath.description: Relative Path to cohort folder in filesystem
relativePath.$comment: This is for visualization of assets

sourceSystem.description: How cohort was introduced into SPINE

keywords.description: Array of keywords defining contents of cohort

iri.description: internationalized Resource Identifier for keyword concept
iri.$comment: This is an ontological identifier, that can be used as link in some cases, eg. http://purl.bioontology.org/ontology/SNOMEDCT/24700007

diseases.description: Array of disease codes for cohort

label.description: Label to be displayed along with the disease code, eg. Multiple Sclerosis

icdCode.$comment: This is an ICD 10 code, eg. G35 for MS

url.description: Link to external page with disease classification
url.$comment: This link can refer to external page with disease description, eg. https://www.icd10data.com/search?s=G36
